biotools.summary: Basic Long-read Enabled Toolkit for Interspersed DNA Elimination Studies (BleTIES) is a tool for prediction and targeted assembly of internally eliminated sequences (IESs) in ciliate genomes, using single-molecule long read sequencing. The design and name of the software was inspired by ParTIES.

bioschemas.name: BleTIES
